objective: Fix missing hero+footer text from i18n
verification_note: Root cause: x-text directives require parent x-data scope to be processed by Alpine.js. Hero section and footer had no x-data attribute — Alpine ignored all x-text bindings causing blank text. Fix: added x-data to hero <section> and footer <footer>. Audited all 8 other sections — all already had x-data. No regression - view:cache + build success (CSS 80KB JS 85KB)

CSS variable override approach — zero template rewrites: (1) :root.light block overrides all @theme custom properties (dark-*, surface-*, white, gray-*, brand-300/400, green-400) so every Tailwind utility auto-adapts (2) Alpine.store('theme') with localStorage persistence + classList.toggle('light') + meta theme-color update (3) FOUC prevention inline <script> in layout head applies .light class before first paint (4) Sun/moon icon toggle in navbar desktop+mobile (5) .light .cta-primary-glow forces white text on brand-bg buttons (6) .light .stats-bg-radial light blue radial gradient (7) Reduced glow/noise opacity in light mode - view:cache + build success (CSS 81KB JS 85KB)

Root cause: dark-mode glow effects (radial arcs, section blobs, SVG neon curves, hero orbs, noise overlay, CTA shadow pulse) looked dirty/norak on white backgrounds — designed for dark only. Fix: (1) premium-glow-arc display:none (2) section-glow::before display:none (3) stats-curve-animated opacity:0 (4) hero-bg-orb display:none (5) body::after noise display:none (6) cta-primary-glow animation:none w/ subtle static shadow (7) stats-bg-radial pure #ffffff (8) hero-bg-gradient overridden to subtle #f0f7ff→white (9) stats-top-fade white→transparent (10) testimonial scroll fades hardcoded white. Added CSS hook classes hero-bg-orb, hero-bg-gradient, stats-top-fade to templates for targeting - view:cache + build success (CSS 82KB JS 85KB)

objective: Fix HTML lang sync + FOUC prevention

Root cause: Blade interprets @context in JSON-LD as @context directive (Laravel 12). Generated unclosed if(context()->has()) PHP block. Fix: escape @context→@@context and @type→@@type in both ProfessionalService + FAQPage JSON-LD blocks. Verified: view renders 170844 bytes + view:cache SUCCESS

5 tables: portfolios (title/category/desc bilingual/tech_stack JSON/image/url/sort/active), pricing_packages (name/subtitle/price/features bilingual JSON/cta/wa_message/popular/sort/active), testimonials (name/position bilingual/company/content bilingual/avatar/rating/sort/active), contacts (name/email/phone/service/message/status enum/notes), site_settings (key unique/value/group/type/label). All migrations run via php artisan migrate
5 models with fillable/casts (JSON arrays+booleans+decimals), scopes (active/ordered/new/latest). SiteSetting: static getValue/setValue/getGrouped/clearCache with Cache::remember 1hr
